title: Episode 7 - Learning Is In The Doing
description:
"Authenticity...that is always the answer, it is always best to show up as yourself."
Learning Is In The Doing
Danielle Lewis
Danielle Lewis is one of the most dynamic marketing experts I've ever met. Her mind is constantly turning and I find her fascinating. You'll hear us talk about how to market your brand and developing an audience.
Show Topics:
Understanding branding and marketing
How to know when it's time to quit your job
Small business consulting
How to lean into your strengths
How to be you in every room
--
Danielle is a communications pro with over 12 years of beauty experience both behind the brushes as an artist and on the business side as a brand strategist. You can find her hosting live shows online, writing creative copy, managing strategic branding & marketing initiatives and bringing bright ideas to life.
She is currently accepting small business clients that are looking to grow a marketing strategy. Please reach out to her via Instagram @thedaniellelewisshow.
--
This is Delina's village and you're about to be a part of it. Welcome to It Takes A Village, The True Story of A Beautypreneur.
For more info and show notes please visit delinamedhin.com.
Join us by shouting out and celebrating your village by using the hashtag #ShareYourVillage
dc:creator: Delina Medhin
